verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Command <S%H6680><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that they put <S%H7971>out<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> every <S%H6879>leper<s%>, and every one that hath an <S%H2100>issue<s%>, and whosoever is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> by the <S%H5315>dead<s%>:

both <S%H2145>male<s%> and <S%H5347>female<s%> shall ye put <S%H7971>out<s%>, <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> shall ye <S%H7971>put<s%> <S%H2930>them<s%>; that they defile not their <S%H4264>camp<s%>, in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> <S%H834>whereof<s%> I <S%H7931>dwell<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> did <S%H6213>so<s%>, and put them <S%H7971>out<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>; as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, so <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, When a <S%H376>man<s%> or <S%H802>woman<s%> shall <S%H6213>commit<s%> any <S%H2403>sin<s%> that <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H4603>commit<s%>, so as to <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be <S%H816>guilty<s%>;

then he shall <S%H3034>confess<s%> his <S%H2403>sin<s%> which he hath <S%H6213>done<s%>: and he shall make <S%H7725>restitution<s%> for his <S%H817>guilt<s%> in <S%H7218>full<s%>, and <S%H3254>add<s%> unto it the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part <S%H5414>thereof<s%>, and give it unto him in respect of whom he hath been <S%H816>guilty<s%>.

But if the <S%H376>man<s%> have no <S%H1350>kinsman<s%> to whom <S%H7725>restitution<s%> may be made for the <S%H817>guilt<s%>, the <S%H7725>restitution<s%> for <S%H817>guilt<s%> which is made unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall be the <S%H3548>priest<s%>'s; besides the <S%H352>ram<s%> of the <S%H3725>atonement<s%>, whereby atonement shall be made for <S%H3722>him<s%>.

And every <S%H8641>heave-offering<s%> of all the holy <S%H6944>things<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which they <S%H7126>present<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, shall be his.
And every <S%H376>man<s%>'s hallowed <S%H6944>things<s%> shall be <S%H376>his<s%>: whatsoever any man <S%H5414>giveth<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, it shall be his.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H376>them<s%>, If any <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%> go <S%H7847>aside<s%>, and <S%H4603>commit<s%> a trespass against <S%H4604>him<s%>,

and a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7901>lie<s%> with her <S%H7902>carnally<s%>, and it be <S%H5956>hid<s%> from the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of her <S%H376>husband<s%>, and be kept <S%H5641>close<s%>, and she be <S%H2930>defiled<s%>, and there be no <S%H5707>witness<s%> against <S%H8610>her<s%>, and she be not taken in the act;

and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H5674>come<s%> upon <S%H7065>him<s%>, and he be jealous of his <S%H802>wife<s%>, and she be <S%H2930>defiled<s%>: or if the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H5674>come<s%> upon <S%H7065>him<s%>, and he be jealous of his <S%H802>wife<s%>, and she be not <S%H2930>defiled<s%>:

then shall the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and shall <S%H935>bring<s%> her <S%H7133>oblation<s%> for <S%H6224>her<s%>, the tenth part of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H7058>meal<s%>; he shall <S%H3332>pour<s%> no <S%H8081>oil<s%> upon <S%H5414>it<s%>, nor put <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> <S%H4503>thereon<s%>; for it is a meal-offering of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%>, a <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> of <S%H2146>memorial<s%>, <S%H2142>bringing<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> to <S%H2142>remembrance<s%>.
And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall bring her <S%H7126>near<s%>, and <S%H5975>set<s%> her <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>:

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> in an <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%>; and of the <S%H6083>dust<s%> that is on the <S%H7172>floor<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> it into the <S%H4325>water<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5975>set<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and let the hair of the <S%H802>woman<s%>'s <S%H7218>head<s%> go <S%H6544>loose<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> of <S%H2146>memorial<s%> in her <S%H3709>hands<s%>, which is the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%>: and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall have in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> that causeth the <S%H779>curse<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall cause her to <S%H7650>swear<s%>, and shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H802>woman<s%>, If no <S%H376>man<s%> have <S%H7901>lain<s%> with <S%H7847>thee<s%>, and if thou have not gone aside to <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%>, being under thy <S%H376>husband<s%>, be thou <S%H5352>free<s%> from this <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> that causeth the <S%H779>curse<s%>.

But if thou have gone <S%H7847>aside<s%>, being under thy <S%H376>husband<s%>, and if thou be <S%H2930>defiled<s%>, and some <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5414>have<s%> <S%H7903>lain<s%> with thee <S%H1107>besides<s%> thy <S%H376>husband<s%>:

then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7650>cause<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> to swear with the <S%H7621>oath<s%> of <S%H423>cursing<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H802>woman<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5414>make<s%> thee a <S%H423>curse<s%> and an <S%H7621>oath<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, when <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> doth <S%H5414>make<s%> thy <S%H3409>thigh<s%> to fall <S%H5307>away<s%>, and thy <S%H990>body<s%> to <S%H6639>swell<s%>;

and this <S%H4325>water<s%> that causeth the <S%H779>curse<s%> shall <S%H935>go<s%> into thy <S%H4578>bowels<s%>, and make thy <S%H990>body<s%> to <S%H6638>swell<s%>, and thy <S%H3409>thigh<s%> to fall <S%H5307>away<s%>. And the <S%H802>woman<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H543>Amen<s%>, <S%H543>Amen<s%>.
And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3789>write<s%> these <S%H423>curses<s%> in a <S%H5612>book<s%>, and he shall <S%H4229>blot<s%> them out into the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H4751>bitterness<s%>:

and he shall make the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> that causeth the <S%H779>curse<s%>; and the <S%H4325>water<s%> that causeth the <S%H779>curse<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into her and become <S%H4751>bitter<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> out of the <S%H802>woman<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H7126>bring<s%> it unto the <S%H4196>altar<s%>:

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall take a <S%H7061>handful<s%> of the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>, as the <S%H234>memorial<s%> <S%H6999>thereof<s%>, and burn it upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and <S%H310>afterward<s%> shall make the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%>.

And when he hath made her <S%H8248>drink<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%>, then it shall come to <S%H2930>pass<s%>, if she be defiled, and have <S%H4603>committed<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against her <S%H376>husband<s%>, that the <S%H4325>water<s%> that causeth the <S%H779>curse<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into her and become <S%H4751>bitter<s%>, and her <S%H990>body<s%> shall <S%H6638>swell<s%>, and her <S%H3409>thigh<s%> shall fall <S%H5307>away<s%>: and the <S%H802>woman<s%> shall be a <S%H423>curse<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> her <S%H5971>people<s%>.
And if the <S%H802>woman<s%> be not <S%H2930>defiled<s%>, but be <S%H2889>clean<s%>; then she shall be <S%H5352>free<s%>, and shall <S%H2232>conceive<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%>.
This is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%>, when a <S%H802>wife<s%>, being under her <S%H376>husband<s%>, goeth <S%H7847>aside<s%>, and is <S%H2930>defiled<s%>;

or when the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H5674>cometh<s%> upon a <S%H376>man<s%>, and he is <S%H7065>jealous<s%> of his <S%H802>wife<s%>; then shall he <S%H5975>set<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6213>execute<s%> upon her all this <S%H8451>law<s%>.
And the <S%H376>man<s%> shall be <S%H5352>free<s%> from <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, and <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> her <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.
